Verses: 1 seyeer Malaivazhiyaai Orebukkup Padhinorunaal Pirayaana Dhooraththilulla Kaadhesbarneyaavilirundhu,

2 sooppukku Edhiraagavum, Paaraanukkum Thoppelukkum Laapaanukkum Aasaroththukkum Thisaakaapukkum Naduvaagavum Irukkira Yordhaanukkum Ikkaraiyaana Vanaandharaththin Samanaana Veliyile Vandhapodhu, Mose Isravelar Ellaaraiyum Nokkich Sonna Vasanangalaavana:
3 esponil Kudiyirundha Emoriyarin Raajaavaagiya Seekonaiyum, Edhreyin Aruge Asdharoththil Kudiyirundha Paasaanin Raajaavaagiya Ok Enbavanaiyum, Mose Muriya Adiththapinbu,
4 naarpadhaam Varusham Padhinoraam Maadham Mudhal Thedhiyile, Mose Isravel Puththirarukkuch Sollumbadi Thanakkuk Karththar Vidhiththa Yaavaiyum Avargalukkuch Sonnaan.
5 yordhaanukku Ippuraththilirukkira Movaabin Dhesaththil Mose Indha Niyaayappiramaanaththai Vivariththuk Kaanbikkath Thodangi,
6 orebile Nammudaiya Dhevanaagiya Karththar Nammode Sonnadhu Ennavendraal: Neengal Indha Malaiyaruge Thangiyirundhadhu Podhum.

7 neengal Thirumbip Pirayaanam Purappattu, Emoriyarin Malainaattirkum, Adharku Aduththa Ellaa Samanaana Veligalilum Kundrugalilum Pallaththaakkugalilum, Thendhisaiyilum Kadaloraththilum Irukkira Kaanaaniyarin Dhesaththukkum, Leebanonukkum, Aippiraaththu Nadhi Ennum Periya Nadhivaraikkum Pongal.

8 idho Indhath Dhesaththai Ungalukku Munbaaga Vaiththen; Neengal Poi, Karththar Ungal Pidhaakkalaagiya Aabiragaamukkum Eesaakkukkum Yaakkobukkum Avargalukkup Pinvarum Avargal Sandhadhikkum Aanaiyittukkoduththa Andhath Dhesaththaich Sudhandhariththukkollungal Endraar.
9 akkaalaththil Naan Ungalai Nokki: Naan Oruvanaaga Ungal Baaraththaith Thaangak Koodaadhu.
10 ungal Dhevanaagiya Karththar Ungalaip Perugappanninaar; Idho, Innaalil Neengal Vaanaththu Natchaththirangalaippolath Thiralaayirukkireergal.
11 neengal Ippozhudhu Irukkiradhaip Paarkkilum Aayiramadangu Adhigamaagumbadi Ungal Pidhaakkalin Dhevanaagiya Karththar Ungalukkuch Solliyapadiye Ungalai Aaseervadhippaaraaga.
12 ungal Varuththaththaiyum Pirayaasaththaiyum Vazhakkukalaiyum Naan Oruvanaaith Thaanguvadhu Eppadi?
13 naan Ungalukku Adhibadhigalai Erpaduththumporuttu, Ungal Koththirangalil Gnaanamum Vivegamum Arivum Ullavargal Endru Perpetra Manidharaith Therindhukollungal Endru Sonnen.
14 neengal Enakkup Piradhiyuththaramaaga: Neer Seyyasonna Kaariyam Nalladhu Endreergal.

15 aagaiyaal Naan Gnaanamum Arivumulla Manidharaagiya Ungal Koththirangalin Vamsapadhigalaith Therindhukondu, Avargal Ungalukkuth Thalaivaraayirukkumbadi, Aayiramperukkudh Adhibadhigalaagavum, Nooruperukku Adhibadhigalaagavum, Aimbadhuperukku Adhibadhigalaagavum, Paththupperukku Adhibadhigalaagavum Ungal Koththirangalil Adhigaarigalaagavum Erpaduththivaiththen.

16 akkaalaththile Ungaludaiya Niyaayaadhibadhigalai Naan Nokki: Neengal Ungal Sagodhararin Viyaachchiyangalaik Kettu, Irupatchaththaaraagiya Ungal Sagodhararukkum, Avargalidaththil Thangum Anniyanukkum, Needhiyinbadi Theerppuchcheyyungal.

17 niyaayaththile Mugadhaatchiniyam Paaraamal Periyavanukkuch Sevikoduppadhupolach Chiriyavanukkum Sevikodukkakkadaveergal; Manidhan Mugaththirkup Bayappadaadheergalaaga; Niyaayaththeerppu Dhevanudaiyadhu; Ungalukkuk Kadinamaayirukkum Kaariyaththai Ennidaththil Konduvaarungal; Naan Adhaik Ketpen Endru Solli,
18 neengal Seyyavendiya Kaariyangal Yaavaiyum Akkaalaththile Kattalaiyitten.

19 nammudaiya Dhevanaagiya Karththar Namakkuk Kattalaiyittapadiye, Naam Orebaivittup Pirayaanampanni, Emoriyarin Malainaattirku Neraaga Neengal Kanda Andhap Bayangaramaana Periya Vanaandharavazhi Muzhuvadhum Nadandhuvandhu, Kaadhesbarneyaavile Serndhom.
20 appozhudhu Naan Ungalai Nokki: Nammudaiya Dhevanaagiya Karththar Namakkuk Kodukkum Emoriyarin Malainaadumattum Vandhu Serndheergal.

21 idho, Un Dhevanaagiya Karththar Andhath Dhesaththai Unakku Munbaaga Vaiththirukkiraar; Un Pidhaakkaludaiya Dhevanaagiya Karththar Unakkuch Sonnapadiye, Nee Poi Adhaich Sudhandhariththukkol; Bayappadaamalum Kalangaamalum Iru Endren.

22 appozhudhu Neengal Ellaarum Ennidaththil Vandhu Namakkaaga Andhath Dhesaththaich Sodhiththuppaarkkavum, Naam Innavazhiyaaga Adhil Sendru, Innapattanangalukkup Pogalaam Endru Namakku Maruseydhi Konduvaravum, Namakku Munnaaga Manidharai Anuppuvom Endreergal.
23 adhu Enakku Nandraaik Kandadhu; Koththiraththukku Oruvanaagap Pannirandu Manidharaith Therindheduththu Anuppinen.
24 avargal Purappattu, Malaigalil Eri, Eskol Pallaththaakkumattum Poi, Adhai Vevupaarththu,
25 aththesaththuk Kanigalil Silavatraith Thangal Kaiyil Eduththukkondu Nammidaththil Vandhu, Nammudaiya Dhevanaagiya Karththar Namakkuk Kodukkum Dhesam Nalla Dhesam Endru Nammidaththil Sonnaargal.
26 appadiyirundhum, Neengal Pogamaattom Endru Ungal Dhevanaagiya Karththarudaiya Kattalaikku Virodhamaaga Edhirththu,
27 ungal Koodaarangalil Murumuruththu: Karththar Nammai Veruththu, Nammai Azhikkumporuttaaga Nammai Emoriyarin Kaiyil Oppukkodukkumbadi, Nammai Egipthudhesaththilirundhu Purappadappanninaar.

28 naam Enge Pogalaam; Andha Janangal Nammaippaarkkilum Balavaangalum, Netiyavargalum, Avargal Pattanangal Periyavaigalum, Vaanaththaiyalaavum Madhilullavaigalumaai Irukkiradhendrum, Enaakkiyarin Puththiraraiyum Ange Kandom Endrum Nammudaiya Sagodharar Solli, Nammudaiya Irudhayangalaik Kalangappanninaargal Endru Sonneergal.
29 appozhudhu Naan Ungalai Nokki: Neengal Kalangaamalum Avargalukkup Bayappadaamalum Irungal.
30 ungalukku Mun Sellum Ungal Dhevanaagiya Karththar Thaame Egipthil Ungalodirundhu, Ungal Kangalukku Munbaagach Seydhadhellaavatraippolavum, Ungalukkaaga Yuththampannuvaar.

31 oru Manidhan Than Pillaiyaich Sumandhukondu Povadhupola, Neengal Ivvidaththirku Varugiravaraikkum, Nadandhu Vandha Vazhigal Ellaavatrilum, Ungal Dhevanaagiya Karththar Ungalaich Sumandhukonduvandhadhaik Kandeergale.
32 ungal Dhevanaagiya Karththar Neengal Paalayamirangaththakka Idaththaip Paarkkavum, Neengal Pogavendiya Vazhiyai Ungalukkuk Kaattavum,
33 iravil Akkiniyilum Pagalil Megaththilum Ungalukkumun Sendraare. Ippadiyirundhum, Indhak Kaariyaththil Neengal Avarai Visuvaasiyaamalponeergal.
34 aagaiyaal Karththar Ungal Vaarththaigalin Saththaththaik Kettu, Kadungobamgondu:
35 ungal Pidhaakkalukkuk Koduppen Endru Naan Aanaiyitta Andha Nalla Dhesaththai Indhap Pollaadha Sandhadhiyaaraagiya Manidharil Oruvarum Kaanbadhillai Endrum,

36 eppunneyin Kumaaranaagiya Kaalebmaaththiram Adhaik Kaanbaan; Avan Karththarai Uththamamaaip Pinbatrinabadiyaal, Naan Avan Midhiththuvandha Dhesaththai Avanukkum Avan Pillaigalukkum Koduppen Endrum Aanaiyittaar.
37 andriyum Ungal Nimiththam Karththar Enmelum Kobamgondu: Neeyum Adhil Piravesippadhillai;
38 unakku Munbaaga Nirkira Noonin Kumaaranaagiya Yosuvaa Adhil Piravesippaan; Avanaith Thidappaduththu; Avane Adhai Isravelukkuch Sudhandharamaagap Pangiduvaan.

39 kollaiyaavaargal Endru Neengal Sonna Ungal Kuzhandhaigalum, Innaalile Nanmai Theemai Ariyaadha Ungal Pillaigalum Adhil Piravesippaargal; Avargalukku Adhaik Koduppen; Avargal Adhaich Sudhandhariththukkolvaargal.
40 neengalo Thirumbikkondu, Sivandha Samuththiraththin Vazhiyaai Vanaandharaththirkup Pirayaanappattuppongal Endraar.

41 appozhudhu Neengal Enakkup Piradhiyuththaramaaga: Karththarukku Virodhamaagap Paavamcheydhom; Nammudaiya Dhevanaagiya Karththar Engalukkuk Kattalaiyittapadiyellaam Naangal Poi Yuththampannuvom Endru Solli, Neengal Yaavarum Ungal Aayudhangalaith Thariththukkondu, Malaiyinmel Era Aayaththamaayirundheergal.

42 appozhudhu Karththar Ennaip Paarththu: Neengal Ungal Saththurukkalukku Munbaaga Murindhupogaadhabadikku, Pogaamalum Yuththampannaamalum Iruppeergalaaga; Naan Ungal Naduve Iren Endru Avargalukkuch Sol Endraar.
43 appadiye Naan Ungalukkuch Sonnen; Neengalo Sevikodaamal, Karththarudaiya Kattalaikku Virodhamaagath Thunindhu Malaiyinmel Erineergal.
44 andha Malaiyile Kudiyirundha Emoriyar Ungalai Edhirkkumbadi Purappattuvandhu, Theneekkal Thuraththugiradhupola Ungalaith Thuraththi, Ungalaich Cheyeer Thodangi Ormaamattum Muriya Adiththaargal.
45 neengal Thirumbivandhu, Karththarudaiya Samugaththil Azhudheergal; Karththar Ungal Saththaththaikketkavillai, Ungalukkuch Sevikodukkavum Illai.
46 ippadi Kaadhesile Thangi, Ange Vegunaalaayirundheergal.
